scripts.dev: yarn db:startContainer && concurrently "yarn workspace server dev" "yarn workspace client start" -n "EchoChamber,React"
scripts.db:build: docker build -t echochamber-db . && docker volume create echochamber_db-data-dev
scripts.db:startContainer: docker start echochamber-db-dev || echo Creating New DB Container... && docker run -d -it -p 5432:5432 --name=echochamber-db-dev --mount source=echochamber_db-data-dev,target=/var/lib/postgresql/data echochamber-db
scripts.deploy: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "yarn workspace server start" "yarn workspace client deploy" -n "EchoChamber,React"
